sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { RouterModule, ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { ReactiveFormsModule, FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { Observable, switchMap } from 'rxjs'; import { NewsService } from '../../../core/services/news.service'; import { News } from '../../../core/models/news.model'; import { LoadingComponent } from '../../../shared/components/loading/loading.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-news-form', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule, RouterModule, ReactiveFormsModule, LoadingComponent], template: `
  1. Dashboard
  2. News
  3. {{ isEditMode ? 'Edit News' : 'Add News' }}

{{ isEditMode ? 'Edit News Article' : 'Add New Article' }}

Article Details
Title is required
Summary is required
Content is required
Publication Settings
Author is required
Publish date is required
Separate tags with commas (e.g., technology, news, update)
` }) export class NewsFormComponent implements OnInit { isLoading$: Observable = new Observable(); isEditMode = false; newsForm: FormGroup; availableTags$: Observable = new Observable(); isSubmitting = false; constructor(private fb: FormBuilder, private newsService: NewsService) { this.newsForm = this.fb.group({ title: ['', Validators.required], summary: ['', Validators.required], content: ['', Validators.required], author: ['', Validators.required], publishDate: ['', Validators.required], tagsInput: [''], isArchived: [false] }); } ngOnInit(): void {} onSubmit() { this.isSubmitting = true; // Implement submit logic } addTag(tag: string) { // Implement add tag logic } }
